top_comments.comment: As a Japanese I think this content is very meanigful especially for our country. I wanted to introduce it to my friends,but most Japanese need Japanese subtitles to understand…would you mind considering about this?

Last year really opened people's eyes and understanding. It was a humbling year for many. One of it is, the fruitlessly of a frantic non-stop work-life. Everything came to a grinding halt. It was a real Vision 20-20. People have learnt that they can be survive, be happy and content with less money. Why not do what you enjoy or have a job that is flexible enough to give you time for what you love?
I submitted my resignation today 🙌🤗😌☺🙏

Until the latter half of October 2021, for the past three years I had been signing off from work in line with close of business defined by my manager.
In the three years, I switched thrice for growth and better pay which I did get. However, I just got fed up with long hours, nonsensical subordination and lop-sided work-life balance.

I quit in Oct.
Now, I am a freelancer and sign off from work when I deem fit:)
